translation.en: -[distant piano music playing] -[distant applause]
translation.ja: “パシフィック･パール号”

translation.en: Our target is wearing a captain's uniform. I repeat, a person in a captain's uniform.
translation.ja: ターゲットは船長 船長の制服を着ている奴だ

translation.en: -Thank you. -Bravo!
translation.ja: どうも

translation.en: Come with me, Captain.
translation.ja: こちらへ 船長

translation.en: Let's go find our table. The show's about to start.
translation.ja: ショーが始まります

translation.en: Goddamn! That is bright. I can't see anything in there.
translation.ja: チクショウ！まぶしくて何も見えない

translation.en: [grunts] Yeah. It's like looking straight into the sun.
translation.ja: 太陽をじっと見てるみたいだ

translation.en: What the hell is he up to in there? I bet something nuclear.
translation.ja: 何をたくらんでる？ 核爆発か？

translation.en: Remove your night-vision goggles. I repeat, remove the night-vision goggles.
translation.ja: 暗視スコープだ 暗視スコープを外せ

translation.en: This better work, Mr. Know-It-All Vision Expert.
translation.ja: この方が見えるんだ知ったかぶりめ

translation.en: Okay, fine.
translation.ja: まあ いいだろう

translation.en: -Set your tasers for max electrocution. -[device chirps]
translation.ja: テーザー銃を最強にしろ

translation.en: Let's take this asshole down hard.
translation.ja: 悪党をぶちのめしてやれ

translation.en: Hold on a sec. Wait, wait! There are multiple captains in there.
translation.ja: 待て！　船長が複数人いる

translation.en: [chief on radio] Decoys.
translation.ja: おとりだ

translation.en: Ugh, so devious.
translation.ja: 小賢しい奴め

translation.en: Go, go, go!
translation.ja: 突入しろ！

translation.en: Pacify the captains! Our target could be any one of them.
translation.ja: 船長を全員 捕らえろ

translation.en: No! No! Oh! Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa.
translation.ja: やめろ！

translation.en: [chief] Son of a bitch!
translation.ja: クソッたれ！

translation.en: But they're just kids!
translation.ja: ただの子どもだ

translation.en: This is no time to categorize or pigeonhole people, Agent Steel.
translation.ja: えり好みしてる時間はないスティール

translation.en: Tase them all.
translation.ja: 全員捕らえろ

translation.en: [agent] That's what you get for being a decoy.
translation.ja: おとりなら自業自得だ

translation.en: -[agent 2] Do not move! Do not move! -[screams]
translation.ja: 動くな！

translation.en: Well, well, well. [chuckles]
translation.ja: これはこれは

translation.en: What have we got here?
translation.ja: こいつだな

translation.en: I am Captain Tucker, and I am in charge of this vessel.
translation.ja: 私がこの船の指揮官タッカー船長だ

translation.en: What on earth are you doing here? -I demand answers! -Oh…
translation.ja: これはどういうことだ？答えろ

translation.en: -[groans] -You'll get your answers all right.
translation.ja: もちろん答えてやるよ

translation.en: You'll get your answers
translation.ja: だがそれは

translation.en: in a jail cell.
translation.ja: 刑務所の中でだ

translation.en: Well, uh, actually, we should probably read him his rights
translation.ja: まずは彼の権利について話して

translation.en: and inform him of the charges against him.
translation.ja: 逮捕理由を伝えるべきです

translation.en: And all that.
translation.ja: でしょう？

translation.en: Oh, nice, Steel. That was a cool-ass line. Way to ruin the moment.
translation.ja: いかしたセリフだな雰囲気がぶち壊しだ

translation.en: You wanna do that cool line again, Chief?
translation.ja: チーフも言えば？

translation.en: Nope, nope, nope. The moment is gone.
translation.ja: タイミングを逃した

translation.en: Steel took that away from us.
translation.ja: こいつのせで

translation.en: Everyone, just… Let's just leave. Let's go.
translation.ja: 全員退却だ　行くぞ “警察”

translation.en: Hello, sir. They got him.
translation.ja: はい またも捕まりました

translation.en: It's on again.
translation.ja: またも捕まりました

translation.en: [Captain Tucker] This is scandalous! Agh!
translation.ja: こんな屈辱！

translation.en: [reporter] It was just after midnight
translation.ja: 〝トラッセル商船学校〞 〝トラッセル商船学校〞昨夜遅く― 昨夜遅く―

translation.en: police raided the Pacific Pearl and arrested Captain Herman Tucker
translation.ja: 警察はタッカー船長を逮捕しました

translation.en: on multiple charges of drug smuggling, trafficking, possession of illegal firearms,
translation.ja: 麻薬密輸や人身売買違法銃器の所持などの〝ニュース速報〞

translation.en: and slaughter of endangered animals.
translation.ja: 容疑がかかってます

translation.en: -[student] Watch out. Pee incoming. -Ugh!
translation.ja: おしっこが来るぞ

translation.en: That's a good one.
translation.ja: おもしろい

translation.en: Yeah, looks like I peed my pants pretty massively.
translation.ja: まるで盛大に漏らしたみたいだ

translation.en: Whatever, Fall.
translation.ja: 言ってろよ

translation.en: [sighs] Yep, just emptied my bladder in my pants.
translation.ja: ズボンに漏らした

translation.en: That's me. No, that's… It's good stuff.
translation.ja: 僕らしいね　ウケるよ

translation.en: See you at the next, uh… Yeah. [clears throat]
translation.ja: じゃあ また

translation.en: The prosecution is getting ready for the trial of the century.
translation.ja: 検察は裁判の準備を進めていますが 検察は裁判の準備を進めていますが〝タッカー船長を逮捕〞

translation.en: But first, Captain Tucker is going to be isolated in prison,
translation.ja: タッカー容疑者は現在 刑務所に隔離中

translation.en: where should he for some reason pass away,
translation.ja: 彼に何かあった場合

translation.en: the district attorney would lose her only witness.
translation.ja: 唯一の証人を失うためです

translation.en: Oh, it looks like I peed myself, but, um…
translation.ja: 漏らしたみたいだけど

translation.en: I'm just the butt of a great prank. Don't worry.
translation.ja: いたずらされただけさ

translation.en: -Oh… kay. -Yeah, it's not urine.
translation.ja: そうなの？ 尿じゃない

translation.en: -Mm. -Oh, it's actually…
translation.ja: これは…

translation.en: It's actually Fanta.
translation.ja: ファンタだ

translation.en: Whatever, Fall. Exam results are in. You should check 'em out.
translation.ja: それより試験結果を見に行ったら？

translation.en: They're here? Should I be excited or--
translation.ja: 出てた？　いい感じかな？

translation.en: [sarcastically] Oh yeah. This is it.
translation.ja: そうかもね

translation.en: This is the exam that decides your career, and you really stand out.
translation.ja: 進路が決まる試験で１番目立ってた

translation.en: Really? Oh! [panting]
translation.ja: 本当に？

translation.en: Okay. Here we go.
translation.ja: あれだな 〝最終試験結果〞

translation.en: Fall, Fall. Duh-duh-duh…
translation.ja: フォールは…

translation.en: Duh… No…
translation.ja: ない

translation.en: Oh.
translation.ja: “268位ジョナサン･フォール”

translation.en: Ah, darn it.
translation.ja: クソッ

translation.en: [agent] Right…
translation.ja: “容疑者”

translation.en: Guys. Wow, I am just so proud right now.
translation.ja: みんな聞いてくれ俺はお前らを誇りに思う

translation.en: We have helped rid the world of evil.
translation.ja: 極悪人を捕獲したんだ

translation.en: -Let's have some cake. -Fuck, yeah! Cake tastes good.
translation.ja: お祝いだ！ やったね！ケーキは大好物です

translation.en: Yeah, I just have this weird hunch. Am I the only one who thinks
translation.ja: 嫌な予感がします 事件は終わってないような

translation.en: there could be more to this Captain Tucker case?
translation.ja: 事件は終わってないような

translation.en: Say what, Steel?
translation.ja: 何だと？

translation.en: I just mean that… does everyone really believe
translation.ja: 本当に納得してるんですか？

translation.en: that one man single-handedly did all those horrible things by himself
translation.ja: 悪事に加担してたのはタッカー１人で

translation.en: without anyone else on that ship knowing?
translation.ja: 他の船員は関与してないと？

translation.en: Wow.
translation.ja: なるほど

translation.en: Right?
translation.ja: でしょ？

translation.en: [chuckles] Just wow.
translation.ja: 驚いたよ

translation.en: Could be a criminal organization running that ship.
translation.ja: 組織的な犯行かも

translation.en: Captain Tucker could actually just be the tip of the iceberg.
translation.ja: タッカーは氷山の一角で

translation.en: Some kind of pawn. A patsy, a fall guy.
translation.ja: トカゲのしっぽ切りにあった

translation.en: -You know what I think, Steel? -No.
translation.ja: スティール 何でしょう？

translation.en: I think it's actually time for you to shut your big yapper.
translation.ja: いい加減 そのえらそうな口を閉じろ

translation.en: -Right on! -Can't you just enjoy this glorious win?
translation.ja: 今すぐ！ 勝利を喜べないのか？

translation.en: Washington has been this close to shutting us down,
translation.ja: 政府から潰されそうになり

translation.en: and now you come here with this… this nonsense.
translation.ja: お前はバカげたことを言う

translation.en: Yeah, what an asshole!
translation.ja: 生意気だぞ

translation.en: Fuck you, Steel! Fuck you to hell!
translation.ja: お前なんて地獄に落ちろ

translation.en: To be completely honest with you, Steel, no one likes a snoopy agent.
translation.ja: 好奇心が強い捜査官は嫌われるぞ

translation.en: Really?
translation.ja: 本当に？

translation.en: All that sneaking around, gathering evidence,
translation.ja: こそこそと証拠や資料を探し

translation.en: retrieving lost documents, and finding witnesses
translation.ja: こそこそと証拠や資料を探し 事件の証人を探し回る

translation.en: that could shed new light on a case?
translation.ja: 事件の証人を探し回る

translation.en: Ugh. People hate that.
translation.ja: 最悪だ

translation.en: -But that's kind of our job though. -Our job was to crack this case.
translation.ja: それが仕事では？ 事件を解決するのが仕事で

translation.en: -And now it's cracked. -[phone vibrating]
translation.ja: もう達成された

translation.en: Yes?
translation.ja: はい

translation.en: Mm. Unfortunate? [chuckles]
translation.ja: 残念だ

translation.en: Roger that.
translation.ja: 了解

translation.en: Listen up, team.
translation.ja: 聞いてくれ

translation.en: Captain Tucker just killed himself in jail.
translation.ja: タッカーが刑務所で自殺した

translation.en: Suicide, Epstein-style.
translation.ja: 首をつったらしい

translation.en: What?
translation.ja: 何？

translation.en: It's probably because he was torn apart by guilt.
translation.ja: 罪の意識からだろう

translation.en: So the train has left the station. Case closed forever.
translation.ja: もう事件は終わった永遠にな

translation.en: In your face, Steel.
translation.ja: ざまあみろ

translation.en: [chief] Oh! Yes. Oh. Let's go!
translation.ja: 以上だ 行くぞ！

translation.en: ♪ Let's do it, let's do it, let's do it ♪
translation.ja: やろうぜ！　やろうぜ！ やろうぜ！　やろうぜ！ 〝部外秘〞 やろうぜ！　やろうぜ！

translation.en: Yeah!
translation.ja: いいね！

translation.en: Hey, what are you doing with, uh, that evidence?
translation.ja: 証拠をどうするんだ？

translation.en: You heard the chief. Case is closed. We're burning everything.
translation.ja: 捜査は終了だ　すべて燃やす

translation.en: Yeah, just dumping it into the evidence destroyer downstairs.
translation.ja: 下の階にある廃棄場へ持っていく

translation.en: Let me take that down for you.
translation.ja: 俺が持っていくよ

translation.en: I'm actually heading down to the evidence destroyer right now.
translation.ja: 下の階に行くついでさ

translation.en: Great. Thanks. Uh, just don't take it home.
translation.ja: それは助かるが 家に持ち帰ると犯罪になるぞ

translation.en: -That's a federal offense, you know. -Ha-ha!
translation.ja: 家に持ち帰ると犯罪になるぞ

translation.en: I know. I would never do that because that is not what I am going to do.
translation.ja: まさか 家に持ち帰るわけないだろ

translation.en: -Far from it. -Great. Good to hear.
translation.ja: 絶対に それならいい

translation.en: This will not be that one case I couldn't let go of
translation.ja: 事件を独自に追いかけたりしないさ

translation.en: and eventually get totally Carrie Mathison-obsessed with.
translation.ja: キャリー･マティソンみたいに

translation.en: Perfect.
translation.ja: だよな

translation.en: No way, no, sir. Ain't happening. Not this guy.
translation.ja: 俺はそんなことしない

translation.en: Too grounded for that stuff.
translation.ja: 常識はあるさ

translation.en: Hi.
translation.ja: どうも

translation.en: [radio DJ] Well, you're listening to 102.6 The Hawk,
translation.ja: このチャンネルは102･６ ザ･ホーク

translation.en: and up next, we have a great tune from one of my favorites.
translation.ja: 次の曲は私の大好きな曲です 次の曲は私の大好きな曲です〝タナー･フォール船長〞 次の曲は私の大好きな曲です 次の曲は私の大好きな曲です〝フォール船長フォール指揮官〞

translation.en: How can I help you, young man?
translation.ja: 何かご用？

translation.en: Oh, hi. Jonathan Fall. I… I called. Um…
translation.ja: 電話したジョナサン･フォールです

translation.en: Oh yes. Mr. Fall. Please come in.
translation.ja: そうだったわね　どうぞ

translation.en: Oh, I was just looking at my family on the wall out there.
translation.ja: 家族の写真を見てたんです

translation.en: Fall family has been roaming the seas for generations,
translation.ja: フォール家は代々航海してきたので

translation.en: so… they expect nothing less from me.
translation.ja: フォール家は代々航海してきたので 僕にも期待してるんです

translation.en: Let's see here. Jonathan Fall.
translation.ja: あなたのデータを見ましょう

translation.en: Ouch.
translation.ja: あら

translation.en: Okay, well, I know when you look at my grades, it… it doesn't look that great,
translation.ja: たしかに僕の成績だけ見ればひどいけど

translation.en: but the ocean is in my blood. It's in my genes, I think, so…
translation.ja: 僕には海の男の血や遺伝子があるはず

translation.en: Okay.
translation.ja: そう

translation.en: Yeah, my… my… my family was practically responsible for the Allies winning World War II,
translation.ja: 僕の一族は第二次大戦で活躍してるし

translation.en: so not too… shabby. [chuckles]
translation.ja: 少しは期待に応えられると思う

translation.en: The thing is, you had the worst exams in the history of the Naval Academy.
translation.ja: あなたの成績は商船学校史上最低だわ

translation.en: Right now, the closest you'll ever get to commanding a ship
translation.ja: 今のあなたにできる仕事は

translation.en: is turning tricks at the docks.
translation.ja: 波止場の男娼(だんしょう)ね

translation.en: Oh, I don't know, I mean…
translation.ja: それはちょっと…

translation.en: If there were guarantees that I would eventually command a ship…
translation.ja: でも船を操縦させてもらえるなら

translation.en: Just as a starting gig, maybe I--
translation.ja: 考えてもいいけど…

translation.en: I am obviously joking, Fall.
translation.ja: 冗談に決まってるでしょ

translation.en: Yeah. Of course. [chuckles]
translation.ja: ですよね 僕が男娼なんて

translation.en: Me, a hooker? No, I… I would never. That's, um…
translation.ja: ですよね 僕が男娼なんて ありえない

translation.en: I was just joking too. Just, uh…
translation.ja: もちろん冗談ですよ

translation.en: two people in an office just crackin' jokes.
translation.ja: お互い冗談を言い合っただけ

translation.en: Anyway, you were saying?
translation.ja: それで他には？

translation.en: What I can offer you is an extensive personality test,
translation.ja: あとは性格診断テストをして

translation.en: where you can show potential employers what you're really made of.
translation.ja: 適正のある職場を紹介しましょう

translation.en: Maybe you have some hidden talents
translation.ja: もしかしたら隠れた才能が

translation.en: hidden deep, deep down there. Somewhere.
translation.ja: 奥深くに眠ってるかもどこかにね 奥深くに眠ってるかもどこかにね 〝履歴書は整然と〞

translation.en: There. Done. [chuckles] I'm pretty sure I nailed it.
translation.ja: よし 終わった高得点を期待してください

translation.en: Mm, there is nothing to nail. It's a personality test.
translation.ja: 性格診断に得点はつかないわ

translation.en: Hold on. I'll get the results in two secs.
translation.ja: すぐに結果が出るから

translation.en: Ooh, wow, there are some great ships here.
translation.ja: いい船ばかりだ いい船ばかりだ 〝エンペラー･オブ･シーズ〞

translation.en: Could you send my test results to the Emperor of the Seas maybe?
translation.ja: 〝エンペラー･オブ･シーズ〞 この船に結果を送れますか？ この船に結果を送れますか？

translation.en: Is that crazy?
translation.ja: 無理？

translation.en: -[computer beeps] -Oh. Oh Lord.
translation.ja: あら 大変だわ

translation.en: -That good? -No.
translation.ja: すごい？ いいえ

translation.en: But I owe it to your family name to get you something.
translation.ja: でもフォール家のために何かするわ

translation.en: Oh! Ah, this could be an opportunity for you to work on that personality
translation.ja: ここなら あなたの個性を発揮できるし

translation.en: and get some job experience.
translation.ja: キャリアにもなるはず

translation.en: And who knows what could happen down the line, Fall.
translation.ja: 将来につながるかも

translation.en: Wow, that is awesome.
translation.ja: それは すごい！

translation.en: Thank you. Tha… Thank you so much, ma'am.
translation.ja: ありがとうございます

translation.en: That is just a dream come true. Thank you for believing in me.
translation.ja: 夢みたいだ僕を信じてくれて感謝します

translation.en: -[foghorn blares] -[man over PA] Thar she blows!
translation.ja: 〝ミスター･マンクスマジック･パーク〞 〝ミスター･マンクスマジック･パーク〞 潮を吹いたぞ！

translation.en: That's on you, Mrs. Gilroy.
translation.ja: ご夫人 あなたが悪い

translation.en: -That beautiful saggy ass distracted me. -[laughs]
translation.ja: 垂れたケツで俺を誘惑した

translation.en: Oh, never mind. Those things happen.
translation.ja: 気にしないでよくあることよ

translation.en: -Hey, Tanner! -[Mrs. Gilroy chuckles]
translation.ja: やあ タナー！

translation.en: Can't hear me.
translation.ja: 聞こえてない

translation.en: Jonathan, darling.
translation.ja: ジョナサン

translation.en: Hey, Mom.
translation.ja: 母さん

translation.en: I didn't know we were having a party. What's the occasion?
translation.ja: パーティー？ 何の？

translation.en: -Oh, it's your brother's big day. -Big day?
translation.ja: お兄ちゃんの大事な日 そう？

translation.en: Yes, we're celebrating Tanner's 33 and a half birthday.
translation.ja: ええ タナーの33歳半の誕生日祝いよ

translation.en: Oh. Cool.
translation.ja: そうだったね

translation.en: I'll… I'll… I'll just get changed, and then I'll join in.
translation.ja: 僕も着替えて参加するよ

translation.en: Yeah, about that. You know what?
translation.ja: そのことだけど あなたはツリーハウスにいなさい

translation.en: How about you just climb up in your treehouse,
translation.ja: あなたはツリーハウスにいなさい

translation.en: and we'll bring you some food up there.
translation.ja: 食事は持ってくから

translation.en: Your father and I thought that would be a great idea.
translation.ja: その方がいいでしょ

translation.en: I totally agree. It's… It's just that I would really like to, uh, join the party.
translation.ja: いいね　でも僕もパーティーを楽しみたいな

translation.en: Of course, but I think it might be better for you to just skip it.
translation.ja: 気持ちは分かるけどやめた方がいいと思う

translation.en: -So let's go ahead and do that. -Roger that.
translation.ja: 言うことを聞いて ラジャー

translation.en: Oh, Angela, you made it!
translation.ja: アンジェラ 来てくれたのね

translation.en: Hi, Dad.
translation.ja: 父さん

translation.en: Here you go. Chow down.
translation.ja: ほら 食事だ

translation.en: Ooh, thank you. So hungry. Good party?
translation.ja: ありがとうパーティーはどう？

translation.en: Oh yeah. So great. So much fun.
translation.ja: ああ最高に盛り上がってるよ

translation.en: Skrillex is DJing later,
translation.ja: 人気ＤＪも来るぞ

translation.en: and your brother is sparkling like a star down there.
translation.ja: タナーはまるでスターみたいだ

translation.en: Oh. I bet.
translation.ja: だろうね

translation.en: May… Maybe I can come down and join in for a little while?
translation.ja: 僕も少し顔を出そうかな？

translation.en: Just say hello to Uncle Herman and them maybe, just to get a little taste of the fun.
translation.ja: 叔父さんにも挨拶(あいさつ)して雰囲気も楽しみたい

translation.en: Well, in an ideal world, it's exactly what you would have done,
translation.ja: お前の希望を叶(かな)えたいところだが

translation.en: but we don't want to risk you ruining your brother's big day with your presence.
translation.ja: 兄貴の大事な日を台無しにしたくないだろ

translation.en: What? Well, I wouldn't ruin anything.
translation.ja: 台無しにしないさ

translation.en: I'll stay low, have a little friendly chat here and there. Yes?
translation.ja: 目立たず少し会話するだけだよ

translation.en: Nope, not gonna happen.
translation.ja: それは認められない

translation.en: Oh… Okay.
translation.ja: 分かった

translation.en: Oh. Oh. You're taking the ladder?
translation.ja: はしごは？

translation.en: Oh, it's just a security measure.
translation.ja: 念のためだよ

translation.en: Mostly to protect you from people climbing up and disturbing you.
translation.ja: 誰かが登ってこれないように

translation.en: Don't want an old uncle to come up there
translation.ja: 叔父さんが乱入して

translation.en: and have his way with you or anything like that.
translation.ja: お前を襲わないようにな

translation.en: What?
translation.ja: 何？

translation.en: I'm not saying it will happen,
translation.ja: 考えたくないが

translation.en: but statistically, every family has a molester in their ranks.
translation.ja: 家族に変態がいることもある

translation.en: Yikes, okay. Um, well, thank you, I guess.
translation.ja: そうなんだ　ありがとう

translation.en: I'll put it back in the morning, I almost promise.
translation.ja: 朝には戻す　たぶんな

translation.en: Oh, that would be great. Okay. Good night, Dad.
translation.ja: それは助かるよ おやすみ

translation.en: Good night… you. [chuckles]
translation.ja: おやすみ お前はな

translation.en: [chuckles] Tanner. So talented.
translation.ja: まったく すごい才能だ

translation.en: [partygoer] You're the best, Tanner!
translation.ja: いいぞ タナー！

translation.en: [sighs] That's unfortunate.
translation.ja: ついてないな

translation.en: Of course, Mr. Tyrant.
translation.ja: 〝カリビアン･クイーン号〞 はい タイラント様 はい タイラント様

translation.en: -Was that him? -Yeah.
translation.ja: 彼から？ ええ

translation.en: He wants us to take a different approach this time.
translation.ja: 次はやり方を変えろって

translation.en: Instead of finding a captain with certain credentials,
translation.ja: 経験ある船長ではなく

translation.en: he wants us to find a captain with… none.
translation.ja: 無能な船長を探せって

translation.en: Like a wet piece of clay with a license to command a ship.
translation.ja: 操縦免許を持った操り人形？

translation.en: Yeah, I guess.
translation.ja: そうね

translation.en: Let's get to it.
translation.ja: 始めよう

translation.en: Muy bien. Vamos.
translation.ja: ＜ああ 了解＞

translation.en: [Tanner] Yah. Coming through. I know the, uh, captain.
translation.ja: 通せ　船長の知り合いだ

translation.en: He's the kids' uncle, so move it.
translation.ja: この子たちの叔父だどけよ

translation.en: -Hey, say hello to your uncle, kids. -Uncle?
translation.ja: 叔父さんに挨拶しろ 叔父？

translation.en: Just messing with you.
translation.ja: 冗談だ

translation.en: I'm trying to bang their mother, and she made me take them to the park.
translation.ja: こいつらの母親とヤルつもりが押し付けられた

translation.en: -Can you believe that? -What?
translation.ja: こいつらの母親とヤルつもりが押し付けられた えっ？

translation.en: What, what? If you don't wanna know the truth,
translation.ja: 何だ？ 真実を知りたくなければ話を盗み聞くな

translation.en: stop listening in on other people's conversations.
translation.ja: 真実を知りたくなければ話を盗み聞くな

translation.en: I think he… Honestly, I think this one's slow.
translation.ja: こいつは知能が低いな

translation.en: Here. Why don't you go on the ride? Thank you.
translation.ja: 船に乗ってくれ　どうも

translation.en: Insane birthday party, huh?
translation.ja: 昨晩はすごかった

translation.en: I had, like, six beers. I'm hungover like a mofo.
translation.ja: ビール６本でひどい二日酔いだ

translation.en: Okay.
translation.ja: そうか

translation.en: Yeah, it got totally outta hand.
translation.ja: ああ 乱れまくった

translation.en: Fucked three chicks, or hens, or whatever.
translation.ja: ３人とヤッた　熟女とな

translation.en: I thought there were mostly senior citizens there last night.
translation.ja: 参加者は高齢者がほとんどだと？

translation.en: What can I say?
translation.ja: それが？

translation.en: I like the taste of raisins just as good as grapes.
translation.ja: ブドウは干しブドウでもうまいだろ

translation.en: Okay.
translation.ja: そうか

translation.en: Anyway, I can't believe I'm finally 33 and a half.
translation.ja: 信じられないよ俺ももう33歳半だ

translation.en: Wow, time flies when you're doing great and having tons of fun at the same time,
translation.ja: 楽しい時間はあっという間に過ぎてく

translation.en: both at work and in private.
translation.ja: 公私が充実してると

translation.en: Sure… Sure. Yes, I get it.
translation.ja: そうだな　分かるよ

translation.en: Hey, what's wrong with this ride? Can't it go any faster?
translation.ja: ねえもっとスピード出せないの？

translation.en: Well, this is as fast as I am allowed to take this… old lady.
translation.ja: これ以上速度は上げられないよ

translation.en: Come on, Tiny J.
translation.ja: 何だと？

translation.en: You know I'm a real captain, right? I could order you if I wanted to.
translation.ja: 本物の船長である俺が命令しても？

translation.en: Ah, I… [chuckling] I don't think you could do that.
translation.ja: そんなことできないよ

translation.en: Oh. Oh, you wanna test me? Do you?
translation.ja: そうか？ 俺にできないとでも？

translation.en: -No. -Do you seriously wanna test me?
translation.ja: 俺にできないとでも？

translation.en: -I really don't-- -I hereby commandeer this ship.
translation.ja: 俺に操縦させろ

translation.en: [Jonathan] No!
translation.ja: ダメだ！

translation.en: God, Jonathan! That was so dangerous!
translation.ja: 何やってるんだ？危なかったぞ

translation.en: [woman] Where's my baby?
translation.ja: 赤ちゃんが！

translation.en: [man over PA] Thar she blows!
translation.ja: 潮を吹いたぞ！

translation.en: Okay. Well, okay. And now my clothes are wet.
translation.ja: しかも服が濡れたじゃないか

translation.en: Jonathan Fall, you have shown a lack of responsibility,
translation.ja: フォール 君は信頼を裏切った

translation.en: and I have no choice but to remove you of your stripe.
translation.ja: 君の肩章は外させてもらう

translation.en: -Please, sir. You can't do this. -[grunts]
translation.ja: それだけはどうか

translation.en: -Well, I just did! -[distant sirens wailing]
translation.ja: もう遅い

translation.en: Darn, that hurts.
translation.ja: これはつらい

translation.en: Mom?
translation.ja: 母さん？

translation.en: Dad?
translation.ja: 父さん？

translation.en: Anyone home?
translation.ja: 誰かいる？

translation.en: Mom? Dad?
translation.ja: 母さん？　父さん？

translation.en: Hello?
translation.ja: ただいま

translation.en: Anyone in here? No. Where are you guys?
translation.ja: 誰かいる？ いない どこだ？

translation.en: -Hel… Oh! -[rhythmic clicking]
translation.ja: 誰か…

translation.en: -[gasps] What the hell, Jonathan? -Hi.
translation.ja: 何してるの ジョナサン？ やあ

translation.en: You know very well what that metronome means.
translation.ja: メトロノームを見て

translation.en: It's lovemaking at a BPM that makes us come at the exact same second.
translation.ja: このリズムでセックスすれば同時にイケるのよ

translation.en: Yes, I know. Sorry, I… I know.
translation.ja: 知ってるよ ごめん

translation.en: Well? What?
translation.ja: それで？　何だ？

translation.en: [sighs] It's just that I was, uh, demoted at work,
translation.ja: 今日 職場をクビになったから

translation.en: and, um… I was just wondering
translation.ja: 今日 職場をクビになったから タナーに聞いてみてほしいんだ

translation.en: if you could speak to Tanner
translation.ja: タナーに聞いてみてほしいんだ

translation.en: about me maybe getting some work experience on his ship.
translation.ja: タナーに聞いてみてほしいんだ 彼の船で働けないか

translation.en: -He… He won't listen to me. -On Tanner's ship?
translation.ja: 父さんから タナーの船に？

translation.en: Is that how you wanna live your life, taking handouts to get what you want?
translation.ja: お前は他人のおこぼれをもらう人生でいいのか？ お前は他人のおこぼれをもらう人生でいいのか？ 〝潤滑ジェル〞

translation.en: Not working for it? I don't think so.
translation.ja: お前は他人のおこぼれをもらう人生でいいのか？ 〝潤滑ジェル〞 ありえないな

translation.en: -That's not how the Fall family works. -[lube squelches] No way.
translation.ja: フォール家でそれは許されない

translation.en: Jonathan, darling.
translation.ja: ジョナサン

translation.en: Yes, Mom?
translation.ja: 何？

translation.en: Why don't you get out of the room so that your father and I can finish?
translation.ja: 早くイキたいから部屋を出てって

translation.en: No offense, but your presence is a huge, huge turnoff.
translation.ja: 悪いけどあなたがいると萎(な)えるの

translation.en: Yes! Now, get the hell out!
translation.ja: さっさと出てけ！

translation.en: -[metronome clicking] -Jesus. There we go. [grunts softly]
translation.ja: まったく イクぞ

translation.en: Oh, you're s… Okay, yes. That's… That's my cue. [chuckles]
translation.ja: もう？　ああ 出てくよ

translation.en: Okay. We're here.
translation.ja: 〝シーホース職業紹介センター〞着いた　ここよ 着いた　ここよ

translation.en: Oh, and Liza, try not to attract any attention please.
translation.ja: リザ 目立たないように

translation.en: -Just quick in and out, hmm? -Sure thing, Pedro.
translation.ja: 迅速に動くんだ もちろんよ

translation.en: You know me. I'll be discreet.
translation.ja: 私はいつも慎重でしょ？

translation.en: Muy bien.
translation.ja: ＜ああ＞

translation.en: So what can I do for you?
translation.ja: ご用件は？

translation.en: My employer is looking for a captain for a high-end cruise ship.
translation.ja: 高級クルーズの船長を探してます

translation.en: Perfect. We have some of the best candidates in the country.
translation.ja: 最適な候補者が何人もいるわ 〝あなたの未来は今日から始まる〞

translation.en: Great. We are an unconventional cruise line,
translation.ja: 私たちは常識にとらわれず多くの人に

translation.en: and we are all about giving everyone a chance.
translation.ja: 機会を与えたいのです

translation.en: -Sounds good. -Yes.
translation.ja: すてきね ええ

translation.en: So I was hoping we could start at the bottom of your deck and work our way up from there.
translation.ja: なので候補の下位から紹介してください

translation.en: So you want the worst candidate?
translation.ja: 最下位の候補者を？

translation.en: Mm… Maybe.
translation.ja: ええ

translation.en: Well, the very worst candidate is a man by the name of Jonathan Fall.
translation.ja: 最下位ならジョナサン･フォールよ

translation.en: He was at the bottom of his class,
translation.ja: 成績はクラスで最下位

translation.en: and he has all the qualities that you're not looking for in a leader,
translation.ja: リーダーとしての素質もまったくない

translation.en: as you can see here.
translation.ja: これを見てのとおり

translation.en: Hmm. Gullibility through the roof,
translation.ja: だまされやすい

translation.en: extremely low on natural authority, alphaness, suspiciousness. Uh!
translation.ja: 権威欲 支配欲は低く疑い深くない

translation.en: -This seems like a great fit. -Really?
translation.ja: 彼は最適だわ 本当に？

translation.en: Wow, this is so great to hear.
translation.ja: それなら うれしいわ

translation.en: I'm gonna make a huge deal about this and tell everyone.
translation.ja: すごいことだからみんなに伝えましょう

translation.en: Hey. Please, please, Mrs. Porter.
translation.ja: やめてください

translation.en: Discretion is of immense importance to my employer.
translation.ja: 上司は用心深い人なので

translation.en: Are you kidding? I'm already making an Instagram post.
translation.ja: 冗談でしょ？すぐに投稿しますよ

translation.en: We have over 900,000 followers, so the reach is pretty spectacular.
translation.ja: 90万人以上もフォロワーがいるから

translation.en: This is bound to go viral,
translation.ja: きっとバズるわ

translation.en: and you and your employer will have your faces all over it.
translation.ja: あなたたちの顔も拡散されるはずよ

translation.en: You know, I'm so sorry, but we can't have that.
translation.ja: すみませんがそれは困ります

translation.en: -Ah! -Sorry.
translation.ja: ごめんね

translation.en: Sorry. Uh, sorry. Sorry.
translation.ja: ごめんね あなたも

translation.en: Shit.
translation.ja: クソッ

translation.en: Yeah, so, uh…
translation.ja: そうなの…

translation.en: Sorry.
translation.ja: ごめんね

translation.en: Merde.
translation.ja: ＜クソッ＞

translation.en: And… sorry.
translation.ja: あなたも… ごめん

translation.en: Smooth, Liza. Very smooth.
translation.ja: リザ 順調だったな

translation.en: Well, I'll be cocked.
translation.ja: 信じられないわ

translation.en: [Alexis] Jonathan!
translation.ja: ジョナサン！

translation.en: Darling!
translation.ja: ジョナサン！

translation.en: Breakfast is ready!
translation.ja: 朝食ができてるわよ

translation.en: -For me? -Yes, for you, my little scoundrel.
translation.ja: 僕の？ もちろんよ 私のかわいい息子

translation.en: Johnny, good God, we've missed you so much.
translation.ja: 会えなくて寂しかったわ

translation.en: -Since yesterday? -Yes, since yesterday. Did you sleep okay?
translation.ja: 昨日から？ もちろん 昨日からよく寝られた？

translation.en: Oh… Okay. What? What is going on?
translation.ja: いったい何の冗談だ？

translation.en: Please, Mom, this is disgusting. Ya… Revolting!
translation.ja: 母さん やめてくれよ 気持ち悪い

translation.en: What? I am not allowed to tell my favorite son
translation.ja: １番好きな息子に母親が伝えてはいけないの？

translation.en: that I love him and miss him?
translation.ja: 愛してるって

translation.en: What?! Love and miss Jonathan?
translation.ja: ジョナサンを愛してる？

translation.en: I'm… I'm the favorite son. Dad, tell her.
translation.ja: 俺が１番だろ？ 父さん？

translation.en: Sorry, Tanner. We don't favor any of our children.
translation.ja: 俺たちは子どもに順位はつけない

translation.en: But if I was to choose, which I won't, right now it would be Jonathan.
translation.ja: でも どうしても選ぶならジョナサンだ

translation.en: [Alexis] Me too. If I had to. If I was pushed into a corner.
translation.ja: 私もよ　どうしても選ばないといけないなら

translation.en: Okay. What kind of bizarre charade is this?
translation.ja: このおかしな茶番は何だ？

translation.en: You guys always say that you dread the day he was born,
translation.ja: いつもこいつが負け犬なのが恨めしくて

translation.en: and that he's a loser, and that you hoped for so long
translation.ja: いつもこいつが負け犬なのが恨めしくて 生まれた病院で他の子と取り違えられたって言ってた

translation.en: that there was a mix-up at the hospital, and you'd get your real child back.
translation.ja: 生まれた病院で他の子と取り違えられたって言ってた

translation.en: You always say that.
translation.ja: ずっとね

translation.en: That's enough, Tanner. Shoo! Shoo!
translation.ja: もうやめて タナー

translation.en: You received this today from the Caribbean Queen.
translation.ja: カリビアン･クイーン号からこれが届いたの カリビアン･クイーン号からこれが届いたの 〝ジョナサン･フォール船長〞 〝ジョナサン･フォール船長〞

translation.en: You have received a formal job offer
translation.ja: 〝ジョナサン･フォール船長〞 あなたへの正式なオファーよ あなたへの正式なオファーよ

translation.en: to be a captain!
translation.ja: 船長の！

translation.en: -Wow. -What?
translation.ja: すごい 何？

translation.en: What? We're kidding. We're joking, right? [laughs]
translation.ja: これは冗談だよな？

translation.en: Are we kidding? No? What are… You'll be the worst captain on earth!
translation.ja: ウソだろ？　お前なんて世界一最悪な船長になる

translation.en: I don't get it!
translation.ja: ありえない！

translation.en: It… It fits pretty great, doesn't it?
translation.ja: ぴったりだ　どうかな？

translation.en: My beautiful boy, I'm so proud of you.
translation.ja: とても似合うわあなたを誇りに思う

translation.en: Your car is here. Good luck… son.
translation.ja: 迎えが来たようだ 気をつけて 息子よ

translation.en: -[triumphant music continues] -Put that silly hand away.
translation.ja: その手は何だ？

translation.en: Get in here. Oh yeah.
translation.ja: 腕の中に来い

translation.en: [gasps] It's happening.
translation.ja: ウソだろ

translation.en: Oh, damn. That's a warm and loving hug.
translation.ja: 愛情を感じるハグだろ

translation.en: -Your turn, Alexis. -Huh. Oh…
translation.ja: 君も 私…

translation.en: -Go on. You can do this. -Yes, I know how to hug.
translation.ja: 君ならできる もちろんよ

translation.en: -There it is. -[Alexis groans]
translation.ja: そうだ

translation.en: -So much love in the room. -[Alexis] Mm.
translation.ja: 愛に溢れてる

translation.en: So much.
translation.ja: すごくね

translation.en: Okay, yeah.
translation.ja: もういいわね

translation.en: Morning, Captain. Let me take that for you.
translation.ja: 船長 荷物をお持ちします

translation.en: Oh, thank you very much. That's, uh, me, Captain. [chuckles]
translation.ja: ありがとう　僕が船長か

translation.en: -[Blake] Bye-bye, son! -[Alexis] Bye… -[Blake] Great hug. -[Alexis] …you!
translation.ja: じゃあな 息子がんばれよ

translation.en: -Bye, Mom. Bye, Dad. -Bye!
translation.ja: またね　母さん 父さん

translation.en: -Bye-bye. -Bye, Consuela. Oh, bye, Tanner.
translation.ja: じゃあね コンスエラ タナーも

translation.en: Wow.
translation.ja: すごいや

translation.en: [British man] Very well.
translation.ja: いいね

translation.en: Very well indeed.
translation.ja: 実にすばらしい

translation.en: -You see that, Bon Jovi? -[cat meows]
translation.ja: なあ ボン･ジョヴィ？

translation.en: That is my new captain.
translation.ja: 彼が新しい船長だ

translation.en: The future of our enterprise.
translation.ja: 我々の航海を任せるね
